artist: Artist: attributed to Paul Antoine Hannong
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John P. Rutherfurd, in memory of her father Mr. Thomas Shevlin
description: Octagonal faience plate, typical of wares produced at the Hannong factory during its early period; decorated in the popular blue and white 'Oriental' fashion; patterns are carefully outlined with fine lines, then filled with a heavy layer of cobalt blue; stylized floral motifs form a solid band around rim; center is filled with an arrangement of foliage in a basket
title: Plate
